tests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
tests.description: A complete blood count (CBC) is a blood test used to evaluate your overall health and detect a wide range of disorders.
tests.reference_range: Varies based on parameters like WBC, RBC, etc.

tests.name: Fasting Blood Sugar (FBS)
tests.description: Measures the glucose level in your blood after a period of fasting.
tests.test_preparation_instructions: Fast for 8–12 hours before the test.

tests.name: Thyroid Function Test (TFT)
tests.description: Includes tests for TSH, T3, and T4 to assess thyroid gland function.

tests.name: Urine Routine Test
tests.description: Analyzes urine for a wide range of disorders such as urinary tract infections and kidney disease.
tests.test_preparation_instructions: Collect midstream sample in a sterile container.
tests.reference_range: No pus cells, proteins, ketones, etc.

tests.name: COVID-19 RT-PCR
tests.description: Detects the presence of SARS-CoV-2 virus using RT-PCR technology.
tests.test_preparation_instructions: Do not eat, drink, smoke, or chew gum 30 minutes prior to sample collection.
